description:
Space Dandy and the crew find a girl and monsters in unexpected places when they land on a strange planet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A volte anche gli imbroglioni vengono imbrogliati, baby.
Damashi Damasareru Koto mo Aru Jan yo
Occasionally Even the Deceiver Is Deceived, Baby
Parfois, même l`arnaqueur est arnaqué, baby
騙し騙される事もあるじゃんよ
